required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: HYDEAL-D® Application for Promoting the Restoration of Sexual Function in the Postpartum Period
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Clinical Trial to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of HYDEAL-D® Application in Promoting the Restoration of Sexual Function in the Postpartum Period

brief_summary.textblock:
During postpartum and lactation, vaginal epithelium tends to have an impaired degree of hydration and lubrication. This may lead to vaginal dryness, burning sensation dyspareunia or itching, which negatively affect the sexual function of puerperal women.
This study aimed to evaluate the efficacy of HYDEAL-D® vaginal gel (HYALOGYN®, Fidia Farmaceutici, Abano Terme, Italy) application on promoting the restoration of sexual function in the postpartum period.

primary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of sexual function by FSFI

intervention.description: Vaginal gel HYALOGYN® (HYDEAL-D® 2%; Fidia Farmaceutici, Abano Terme, Italy) every 3 days up for 12 consecutive weeks
